GA4GH Variation Representation Specification

Computational Definition

The absolute count of discrete copies of a Molecular Variation, Feature, Sequence Expression, or a CURIE reference within a system (e.g. genome, cell, etc.).

Information Model

Some CopyNumber attributes are inherited from Variation.

Field

Type

Limits

Description

_id

CURIE

0..1

Variation Id. MUST be unique within document.

type

string

1..1

MUST be “CopyNumber”

subject

Molecular Variation | Feature | Sequence Expression | CURIE | Location

1..1

Subject of the Copy Number object

copies

Number | IndefiniteRange | DefiniteRange

1..1

The integral number of copies of the subject in a system
